txt.en: 'From the ravine below, you hear the Rohirrim scouts moving up the path below.'
'There is a guttural cry from the road below, you hear the dunlending forces engaging the scouts below.'
'You hear a rallying call as the Rohirrim forces retreat from the road below.'
You have journeyed with Answith to Brôntrig to distract the Dunlendings from the southern road and the advancing Rohirrim force.
'This day is lost, [placeholder]! It is time to leave.'
Seek out and destroy supply stores in Brôntrig to distract the Dunlendings from noticing the Rohirrim advance.
Burn huts to further distract the Dunlendings.
All is lost. It is time to flee Brôntrig.
